mapper.select: select * from STDNT_INFO order by STDNT_NO desc
select * from STDNT_INFO where ${search_part} like concat('%', #{search_word}, '%') order by STDNT_NO desc
mapper.insert: insert into STDNT_INFO (stdnt_no, stdnt_flnm, user_no, user_eml_addr, user_telno, user_zip, user_addr, user_daddr, user_photo, brdt, dlng_bank_nm, dlng_actno, dpstr_nm, univ_prd, ogdp_univ, ogdp_scsbjt, mjr, stdnt_stts_se) values ('0', #{stdnt_no}, #{emp_no}, #{stts_cd}, #{plc}, #{hr_se}, #{rsvt_dt}, now(), #{dscsn_mthd}, #{dscsn_knd})
